sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-input v-model="requestdata.titleName" placeholder="请输入题目名称" />
  <el-input
    v-model="requestdata.titleData"
    :autosize="{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 4 }"
    type="textarea"
    placeholder="请输入题目"
  />
  <el-input
    v-model="requestdata.description"
    :autosize="{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 4 }"
    type="textarea"
    placeholder="请输入题目额外的描述信息"
  />
  <button @click="print">cilck</button>

  <input type="file" ref="fileInput" @change="handleFileChange" multiple />
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from "vue";

const textarea = ref("");
const fileInput = ref(null); // 定义文件输入的引用
const requestdata = ref({
  titleName: "",
  titleData: "",
  description: "",
  file: "",
});
function print() {
  console.log(requestdata.value);
}

const handleFileChange = () => {
  requestdata.value.file = Array.from(fileInput.value.files);
  console.log(requestdata.value.file);
};
</script>
